author: Yara Hawari
title: Celebrating Land Day amid lockdown in Palestine
description: Israel is taking advantage of the COVID-19 crisis to take more Palestinian land, but the Palestinians will resist.
content: Forty-four years ago today, the Israeli police shot six Palestinian citizens of Israel dead as they were protesting against the Israeli government's expropriation of thousands of acres of Palestinian land in the Galilee. Since then, March 30 has been known as… [+4217 chars]
